thread.title: Professor Green sparks engagement speculation after sharing photo of girlfriend Fae Williams wearing diamond ring
thread.title_full: Professor Green sparks engagement speculation after sharing photo of girlfriend Fae Williams wearing diamond ring

author: Lara Martin
title: Professor Green sparks engagement speculation after sharing photo of girlfriend Fae Williams wearing diamond ring
text:
Professor Green sparks engagement speculation after sharing photo of girlfriend Fae Williams wearing diamond ring The rapper, real name Stephen Manderson, began dating model Fae Williams last year Share Professor Green and girlfriend Fae Williams Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Professor Green has sparked rumours he’s engaged to girlfriend Fae Williams, after sharing a photo of her wearing a HUGE diamond ring. 
The rapper - real name Stephen Manderson - posted the snap to Instagram on Valentine’s Day with the caption: “Fingers crossed this time ay.” 
Many fans took the close-up photo of Fae’s ring as confirmation of an engagement, and Pro Green’s caption as a reference to his failed first marriage to Millie Mackintosh. 
Mirror Celebs has contacted his rep for clarification. This photo of Fae's ring has EVERYONE talking (Photo: Instagram) They were first linked in November (Photo: Getty) https://www.instagram.com/p/BQgbF21DMY4/embed 
He also shared a close up image of the ring before it was gifted to Fae, writing: "Happy valentines @faewilliams as designed by @tessametcalfe ." 
Fans have been flooding his Instagram page with congratulatory messages. One wrote: “Wow, what a ring. Wishing you both a lifetime of happiness, laughter, love and understanding.” 
Pro Green and model Fae were first linked in November, with reports suggesting they had been introduced through mutual friends. 
At the time, a source told The Sun : “ She was absolutely smitten and they’ve been practically inseparable ever since. He’s even been fobbing his mates off for her and for Pro that means it’s the real deal. 
'He’s been on loads of casual dates with various girls since splitting with Millie but this is serious. He’s really into Fae and doesn’t want to mess it up.” Professor Green and Millie on their wedding day in 2013 (Photo: Getty Images) Pro Green and Millie split in 2016 (Photo: Getty) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
